children.Description:
GNATcoverage: Coverage Analysis Tool
GNATcoverage is a tool to analyze and report program coverage.
children.Name: gnatcoverage

children.Description: The Ada Conformity Assessment Test Suite, customised for GCC.
children.Name: ACATS

children.Description: Tools for grading ACATS results, modified for Unix-like systems
children.Name: ACATS-grading

children.Description:
SPARK 2014 is the new version of SPARK, a software development technology specifically designed for engineering high-reliability applications.
SPARK formal verification toolset.
children.Name: spark2014

children.Description:
Ada Web Application - Framework to build high performance secure web applications
Ada Web Application is a framework to build a Web Application in Ada 2012. The framework provides several ready to use and extendable modules that are common to many web application. This includes the login, authentication, users, permissions, managing comments, tags, votes, documents, images.
children.Name: ada-awa

children.Description: AWS is a complete framework to develop Web based applications in Ada.
children.Name: aws

children.Description:
Dynamo Ada Application Code Generator
Code generator used to generate an Ada Web Application or database mappings from hibernate-like XML description, YAML doctrine model or UML models.
children.Name: dynamo

children.Description:
Ada Wiki Engine - Wiki parser and renderer with several Wiki syntaxes
Ada Wiki is a small library that provides a Wiki engine.
children.Name: ada-wiki

children.Description: Ada Security - OAuth 2.0 client and server framework to secure web applications
children.Name: ada-security

children.Description:
Ada EL - Expression Language Library (JSR245)
This library provides the support for a simple Expression Language close to the Java Unified Expression Language (EL).
children.Name: ada-el

children.Description:
Ada Servlet - Web Servlet Library following JSR 154, JSR 315
Ada Servlet allows to create web applications using the same pattern as the Java Servlet (See JSR 154, JSR 315).
children.Name: ada-servlet

children.Description:
Ada Server Faces - Web Server Faces JSR 252, JSR 314 and JSR 344
Ada Server Faces allows to create web applications using the same pattern as the Java Server Faces (See JSR 252, JSR 314 and JSR 344).
children.Name: ada-asf

children.Description:
Ada support for Swagger codegen
Ada support for Swagger codegen: OpenAPI Generator is a code generator that supports generation of API client libraries, server stubs and documentation automatically given an OpenAPI Spec.
children.Name: swagger-ada

children.Description:
Yet Another Static Site (Generator)
Yet Another Static Site Generator (like Jekyll or Hugo).
children.Name: yass

children.Description:
Wasabee: a Web browser with safety focus 
A Web browser with safety focus.
children.Name: wasabee
